snippet.title: Riddle School 4 (Developer Commentary)
snippet.description:
I won't be changing, remaking, or remastering Riddle School 4.  In my opinion, it's exactly the game it needs to be.

(To be clear: I won't be changing, remaking, or remastering the other games, either.)

Riddle School playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLz0WtSJNeLi-o2GkI3_6gCmgwUzwcsQJl
